gridDisplay.title: Hades

listDisplay.expandedContent: Ruler of the underworld and keeper of the dead, Hades is one of the three great brothers who divided the cosmos. Though feared and rarely worshipped openly, he maintains the balance between life and death, ensuring souls reach their proper destination.
listDisplay.primary: Hades - Lord of the Underworld, God of the Dead

sections.content: Ruler of the underworld and keeper of the dead, Hades is one of the three great brothers who divided the cosmos. Though feared and rarely worshipped openly, he maintains the balance between life and death, ensuring souls reach their proper destination.
sections.title: Description

name: Hades
subtitle: Lord of the Underworld, God of the Dead
description: Ruler of the underworld and keeper of the dead, Hades is one of the three great brothers who divided the cosmos. Though feared and rarely worshipped openly, he maintains the balance between life and death, ensuring souls reach their proper destination.
summary: Ruler of the underworld and keeper of the dead, Hades is one of the three great brothers who divided the cosmos. Though feared and rarely worshipped openly, he maintains the balance between life and death, ensuring souls reach their proper destination.
